XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle Panopto Student Submission module

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Course id

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: text format of intro field

FIELD.NAME: timeavailable
FIELD.COMMENT: Time the assignment is available for student submission

FIELD.NAME: timedue
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the assignment submissions are due by

FIELD.NAME: preventlate
FIELD.COMMENT: Prevent late submissions

FIELD.NAME: resubmit
FIELD.COMMENT: Allow for resubmissions

FIELD.NAME: emailteachers
FIELD.COMMENT: Email submissions to the teacher

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum grade the assignment is worth

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Time the assignment was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the assignment settings were modified

FIELD.NAME: cutofftime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the assignment submissions are cut off

FIELD.NAME: panactivityid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key to the panoptosubmission table

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle user id

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: The title of the session

FIELD.NAME: source
FIELD.COMMENT: The LTI link that opens the submitted content

FIELD.NAME: customdata
FIELD.COMMENT: The custom data the LTI link uses to open the session correctly

FIELD.NAME: width
FIELD.COMMENT: Iframe width.

FIELD.NAME: height
FIELD.COMMENT: Iframe height.

FIELD.NAME: thumbnailsource
FIELD.COMMENT: The source of the thumbnail preview image

FIELD.NAME: thumbnailwidth
FIELD.COMMENT: thumbnail width.

FIELD.NAME: thumbnailheight
FIELD.COMMENT: thumbnail height.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: Grade score for the submission

FIELD.NAME: submissioncomment
FIELD.COMMENT: Submission teacher comment

FIELD.NAME: teacher
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle userId of the teacher who marked the submission

FIELD.NAME: mailed
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the assignment submission notification has been emailed to the teacher.

FIELD.NAME: timemarked
FIELD.COMMENT: Time the assignment submission was marked

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Time the submission record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time the assignment submission was modified

INDEX.NAME: panopto_activity_idx
INDEX.COMMENT: Index on the Panopto Student Submission activity id

INDEX.NAME: panopto_marked_idx
INDEX.COMMENT: Index on the submission marked field
